title: Promo wins not showing up

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: My promo wins aren't showing up properly in the Leagues tab.

replies.body: Sorry to revive a week old topic but... I came here to say the same thing- except it's everything- hot streaks, new to the division, veteran to the division- nothing shows up. it's weirdly blank. I did not however think to screenshot it. Sorry.

This seems to be a visual bug that several players are seeing.  The good news is that your game did not disappear!  The game still counts and you are currently 2-2 in your series.  One more win will get you into Silver!!! ^.^  Wish you the best of luck!
Thank you. I assumed as much but just wanted to put it out there and make sure.
